Whenever Moortull Hex Runner attacks, you may remove a counter from a permanent you don't control. If you do, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
Blitz {2}{G} [i](If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and “When this creature dies, draw a card”. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)[/i]
